name: native-ui
description: Experience better coding in macOS High Sierra.

autoResizeTabs.title: Flexible tabs
autoResizeTabs.description: Resize tabs proportional to the space available.

seamlessScrollbars.title: Seamless editor scrollbars
seamlessScrollbars.description: Use scrollbars that blend into the editor's color scheme when macOS is permanently showing scrollbars. This setting will only take effect when macOS is configured to permanently show scrollbars (instead of auto hiding them by default).
